forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. East wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. North northwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 68. West northwest wind around 7 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
